channel.title: Comments on: Book Cover: Barnabas Horton

item.title: By: Brent Lagerman
item.dc:creator: Brent Lagerman
item.description: We launched the website recently where you can learn more about the book and buy it online. Think it's due to be in stores in spring 2015, but don't quote me on that, check the site for more info: <a href="http://barnabashorton.com/" title="In Search Of Barnabas Horton" rel="nofollow">http://barnabashorton.com/</a>
item.content:encoded: We launched the website recently where you can learn more about the book and buy it online. Think it’s due to be in stores in spring 2015, but don’t quote me on that, check the site for more info: http://barnabashorton.com/
